pixi.plugins.app.Application

type
class
metadata
:keep
Pixi Boilerplate Helper class that can be used by any application

Constructor

new()

Instance Variables

antialias : Bool

Graphics antialias property. default - false

autoResize : Bool

Whether you want to resize the canvas and renderer on browser resize. Should be set to false when custom width and height are used for the application. default - true

backgroundColor : Int

Sets the background color of the stage. default - 0xFFFFFF

canvas(default,null) : js.html.CanvasElement

Canvas Element Read-only

clearBeforeRender : Bool

This sets if the CanvasRenderer will clear the canvas or not before the new render pass. If the scene is NOT transparent Pixi will use a canvas sized fillRect operation every frame to set the canvas background color. If the scene is transparent Pixi will use clearRect to clear the canvas every frame. Disable this by setting this to false. For example if your game has a canvas filling background image you often don't need this set. default - true

forceFXAA : Bool

Force FXAA shader antialias instead of native (faster). default - false

fps(default,accessor) : Int

Default frame rate is 60 FPS and this can be set to anything between 1 - 60. default - 60

height : Float

Height of the application. default - Browser.window.innerHeight

onResize : Void -> Void

Window resize listener function

onUpdate : Float -> Void

Update listener function

pixelRatio : Float

Sets the pixel ratio of the application. default - 1

preserveDrawingBuffer : Bool

enables drawing buffer preservation, enable this if you need to call toDataUrl on the webgl context default - false

renderer(default,null) : Dynamic

Renderer Read-only

roundPixels : Bool

Force round pixels. default - false

skipFrame(default,accessor) : Bool

Default frame rate is 60 FPS and this can be set to true to get 30 FPS. default - false

stage(default,null) : pixi.core.display.Container

Global Container. Read-only

transparent : Bool

Renderer transparency property. default - false

width : Float

Width of the application. default - Browser.window.innerWidth

Instance Methods

addStats() : Void

metadata
:has_untyped

start(?rendererType : String, ?parentDom : js.html.Element) : Void

parameters
[rendererType] - Renderer type to use AUTO (default) | CANVAS | WEBGL
[stats] - Enable/disable stats for the application. Note that stats.js is not part of pixi so don't forget to include it you html page Can be found in libs folder. "libs/stats.min.js"
[parentDom] - By default canvas will be appended to body or it can be appended to custom element if passed
Starts pixi application setup using the properties set or default values
